definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Smooth downshifts are enhanced by a standard, back-torque limiting clutch.
sentences.chinese: 光滑平顺而得到加强，一个标准，回扭矩限制离合器。

sentences.english: In general , a clutch has a clutch has a clutch disc as its major part.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，离合器以离合器盘为其主要部件。

sentences.english: In general , a clutch has a clutch has a clutch disc as its major part.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，离合器以离合器盘为其主要部件。

sentences.english: After gasoline and oil filling, check handle bar, brake and clutch.
sentences.chinese: 在汽油和油，检查处理吧，刹车和离合器。

sentences.english: It adoptss pneumatic cluth to control .
The new 7-speed DSG represents the next stage in the development of dual-clutch technology.
sentences.chinese: 新7档DSG展现了双离合器技术发展的下一个阶段。

sentences.english: Double safety unit prevents screw tap from wearing out.
sentences.chinese: 二重安全离合器装置能防止丝攻之折损。

sentences.english: It is only when the clutch disc is slipping against the flywheel that wearing occurs.
sentences.chinese: 只有当离合器盘在飞轮上打滑时，才会出现磨损现象。

sentences.english: Clutch and overspeed provision during autorotation .
sentences.chinese: 离合器和超速期间提供自转。

sentences.english: If above two requirements are met, it indicates that the silicon oil fan clutch works normally.
sentences.chinese: 符合上述两种要求，说明硅油风扇离合器工作正常。

sentences.english: These fans have a thermostatically controlled viscous clutch.
sentences.chinese: 这些风扇有一个恒温控制的粘液离合器。

sentences.english: It is specially apply for light and medium auto.
sentences.chinese: 特别适用于轻，中型汽车离合器使用。

sentences.english: Intermittent clutch or accumulator seal performance.
sentences.chinese: 间歇离合器或贮积器封口性能。

sentences.english: Thereby some measures for improving rotation strength of clutch lin…
sentences.chinese: 提出了提高离合器衬片旋转强度的措施。

definition: to put into gear/to engage the gear/gear change
(in a manual car) gear (i.e. reverse, neutral, 1st, 2nd etc)/(automatic car) transmission mode (P, R, N, D etc)/(electric fan etc) speed setting
to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
see 放空擋|放空挡[fang4 kong1 dang3]
